page.title: 06ENGLISH CHINA CLAY (cont)
page.content: and as surface coating to produce a smooth, bright and glossy finish. The ceramic industry is by far the oldest user of china clay in the world, and is responsible for its name. In the ceramic industry the clay is used to make tableware (such as china and earthenware) and sanitaryware as well as many other items. China clay is also used in the production of paints, rubber, fertilisers, insecticides, plastics, chemicals, medicines, leather, and textiles. As this report shows, china clay is a very important and well-used item, and helps to provide many everyday items.
